description: Modifies a zero-ETL integration with Amazon Redshift.

parameters.name: IntegrationIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the integration to modify.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the database used as the source for replication.

nested_items.name: TargetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Redshift data warehouse used as the target for replication.

nested_items.name: KMSKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Key Management System (Amazon Web Services KMS) key identifier for the key used to to encrypt the integration.

nested_items.name: AdditionalEncryptionContext
nested_items.description: The encryption context for the integration. For more information, see Encryption context in the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the integration.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the integration was created, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Any errors associated with the integration.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the integration.

nested_items.name: DataFilter
nested_items.description: Data filters for the integration. These filters determine which tables from the source database are sent to the target Amazon Redshift data warehouse.
